name: Dice pool
description:
Dice pool is a simple arcade game made for GMTK jam 2022

You control a blue chip by WASD or Arrows.

Red chips spawn over time and try to touch you. If only one touches you - that's a game over. Your score is equal to total amount of red chips spawned.

You can press left mouse button to spawn more chips and sometimes they may turn out to be green helpful shields.

Art: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/boardgame-pack , https://tenor.com/users/danielkmach

Sounds: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/casino-audio
